 <img src="http://open.ifmo.ru/images/f/fa/2268251_int001.gif"/> The figure shows plane P with light travelling from
    sources S1 and S2. The fringe width is the spacing<LU LEMMA="fringes" CAT="N" FLX="NEUTER_E" Case="loc" Nb="sg">fringe</LU>
    between  No right answer. neighboring high and low intensity
      peaks. neighboring high intensity peaks or low
      intensity peaks. zero-order maximum and the first
      intensity minimum. zero-order maximum and the point of
      observation.
